page.title: 17Religions.
page.content: The main Christian denominations are well represented within the grid area. Church in Wales(8 churches),Non conf- ormists(10 churches), Roman Catholic (1 church) and Salvation Army(1 hall). The oldest Christian foundation in the area, St. Dochdwy's in Llandough, contains an ancient Irbic Cross, now in the care of the Dept. of the Envir- onment. St. Augustine's is the main parish church of Penarth- within the graveyard is the tomb of Dr.J. Parry the famous hymn writer. As you would expect in Wales the various Non-Confo- rmist churches are found, Baptist, Methodist, Presbyterian and United Reform. St. Joseph's in Wordsworth Ave. is the Roman Catholic church for the area. The Salvation Army have a hall in Plassey St.. Non Christian denominations generally seem to go to Cardiff to worship.
